critique: This document is a simple amendment to a previous executive order regarding land conveyance to the State of Hawaii. It doesn't touch on any of the major political axes directly. Therefore, most scores should be neutral. There's no indication of ideological tilt, immigration policy change, expansion of executive power, or shifts in national security vs. civil liberties. It's a technical adjustment related to federal property and its transfer to a state, so federalism is slightly tilted towards state control. There's no economic regulation or social inclusion aspect to this document.
